name: Fate's Twisted Tower
description:
This project is still in development in association Zygobots.

Play as characters that were reincarnated into a new world full of magic and cute slime. Join them in this action-RPG as they fight to get stronger in order to escape the tower.

Timeline

  • End of October: Tutorial, Floor 1, Floor 2, Floor 3 - complete
  • End of November: Cutscenes Added and new levels started
  • End of December:  All Levels complete 
  • Starting January: Quality Assurance
